title: About
body:
Digital Confection, is a web development studio based in Arlington, VA, that provides a full range of web development, design, and digital strategy services for clients looking to build one-of-a-kind websites. 


As a full-service studio, we pride ourselves on being a one-stop-shop for just about anyone web development needs. 


Our passion drives us always to be unique and creative with everything we do. Through our 15+ years of multidisciplinary experience, we know that no two projects will ever be the same. We invest the time in figuring out what you need and ensuring that we can deliver it. We will never take on a project where we can not commit to the highest level of customer service and quality, no matter the monetary size. 


When we bring on a new client, we like to think of ourselves as your partner in success. Because when you win, we win, and that's what we like to call good business. From WordPress templating to custom Drupal modules development, we work with you to provide the best possible services. 


When we are not actively working on a client project, you can find us tinkering away at some of our projects, such as TypeTote and OpenReporter. 


Our Founder

Misha Vinokur is a full-stack developer, designer, and lover of all things digital. Before founding Digital Confection, Misha was the Lead Developer for the US Department of States, Bureau of Educational and Culture Affairs, supervising several high-profile websites. 


Additionally, he founded a journalism technology startup as well as running business sales for Apple. Misha received his BA in Government and International Politics from George Mason University. He enjoys working closely with clients to craft the ideal digital solution to meet their strategic needs.
summary: Digital Confection, is a web development studio based in Arlington, VA, that provides a full range of web development, design, and digital strategy services for clients looking to build one-of-a-kind websites.
summery: Digital Confection, is a web development studio based in Arlington, VA, that provides a full range of web development, design
